description:
BUKA makes stars go boom!

BUKA is a cute game of skill. Facing the impossible odds of countless baddies, BUKA has set on a quest to find The Happy Place.

Protect her with powerful explosions and shockwaves you can create with single touch. Use shockwaves to push objects closer or away.

Destroy everything in your path and navigate through the rest - until you reach The Happy Place!


REVIEWS

"Addictive gameplay, polished presentation and an effective use of the touch-screen result in a gameplay experience of utterly cosmic proportions."
- Pocket Gamer - 9/10 - GOLD AWARD

"A beautifully presented, thoroughly entertaining and hopelessely addictive title."
- Appgamer.net - 9/10

"Buka is a game with a slightly different twist. It is entertaining and easy to pick up and put down. It’s a surprisingly nice piece of art too."
- 148Apps

"Sometimes you just need a little happiness in your day to get yourself through it and so does Buka."
-The Portable Gamer
